title: Software Engineer
description:
Rebuilt the frontend written in Aurelia framework in React.js/Typescript
Used Material UI to build a mobile-responsive interface and split redux/redux-saga to handle state management
Applied DDD approach and implemented CQRS and Event Store on the backend side
Setup swagger to auto-generate API interface in TS types for use on the frontend side
Implemented PDF generation functionality using Wkhtmltopdf library
Integrated Stripe/PayPal payment for both one-time and monthly subscription payments
Wrote Jest unit tests and Cypress e2e tests and set up the Azure pipeline to run both tests before deployment

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
Converted expo app into React Native onet
Integrated OCR technology into the app for scanning business cards with Google Vision API
Used i18n to support multi-languages
Identified entities within documents with google language API
Implemented several image animations, rotating, Cropping, drawing
Integrated with Salesforce, Google API, Microsoft Dynamics, Outlook
Worked on app security in real-time, improved top minification of the code, encrypted database
Created IOS and Android apps and published them to Appstore and Google Play Store.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Developed a hybrid mobile automotive field app from scratch using React Native to provide car service (washing, repairing)
Integrated Alipay and WeChat pay payment into the app for achieving group purchases, card vouchers, and other activities
Implemented pixel-perfect app based on the design provided
Created various components including tables and cards field up with professional and practical information of automotive field fetched from Django back-end
Helped dashboard application development and hosting it on Aliyun web service
Developed a web portal where the employee can submit their project ideas and request resources needed for the project.
